author: TaiSakuma
body: This PR updates example scram options to enable LogDebug in comment lines in two python files in Geometry/CaloEventSetup/test as the old example no longer works in recent versions of scram as suggested in a HN post at: https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/edmFramework/3373/1.html.
title: change comments in Geometry/CaloEventSetup/test
